name: Zero Waste Scotland
goal: Zero Waste Scotland is funded by the Scottish Government to support the delivery of Making things last it circular economy strategy and other low carbon and resource efficiency policy priorities. Zero Waste Scotland is a lead organisation for the delivery of the Scottish Government's European Regional Development Funding for the circular economy and resource efficiency in Scotland.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Waste framework directive, producer responsibility obligations, waste regulation, industrial and commercial waste management, energy efficiency, circular economy, European Regional Development Funding.
